E85EDBA6698148B3B3522E511AAD1B3A.description: Connections can be made to ideas and information in texts, including to similarities and differences within a text and  similarities and differences between texts.

19DFEE79BE7B4E289A6BA17634F406C4.description: Fluency: Comprehension and literary appreciation are improved by the ability to read a range of texts accurately, automatically, and with expression.

4FF6743FD45B4AEFA0DE8B720BA19511.description: Letters in words can be silent.

E07062E087F24D76AEFCC4544F96178C.description: Use compound words to extend vocabulary.
